EVJ.A: At X =2366.8,the label with the highest density is {Chronic Disease Management}

NF.Q: Which countries in the ridgeline chart have ridgeline peaks exceed 6358? Please list the countries and corresponding peak values.
NF.A: {Preventive Care}'s peak at {7658},{Elective Procedures}'s peak at {8008}

NF.Q: Which countries in the ridgeline chart have ridgeline peaks below 2966? Please list the countries and corresponding peak values.
NF.A: {Mental Health}'s peak at {931},{Emergency Services}'s peak at {821},{Surgical Treatments}'s peak at {1031},{Chronic Disease Management}'s peak at {1211}

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Mental Health or Surgical Treatments?
NC.A: {Surgical Treatments} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Elective Procedures or Emergency Services?
NC.A: {Elective Procedures} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Elective Procedures or Surgical Treatments?
NC.A: {Elective Procedures} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

MSR.Q: How many ridges have their peak located to the right of the average X value across all ridges?
MSR.A: There are {2} ridges whose peaks are located to the right of the average X value.

MSR.Q: What is the label of the ridge with the largest span along the mountain height?
MSR.A: The ridge with the largest span in the mountain height is {Pediatric Care}
